items.title: IBM (IBM) Rises Yet Lags Behind Market: Some Facts Worth Knowing

items.title: IBM : Provides Historical Data as a Result of Update to Revenue Categories within Reportable Segments
items.description: We are making changes to the reported revenue categories within our Software and Consulting reportable segments to reflect the market opportunities and how we address them. These changes better align...
